Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the opioid bill had unanimous support from Democrats.
Understate: The claim understates the level of support from Democrats for the opioid bill.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to substantiate the statement that there was "very little Democrat support" for the opioid bill.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Democrats did not support the opioid bill, which is a problematic assumption considering the unanimous support from Democrats.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation to the claim that Democrats did not support the opioid bill, as it was a bipartisan bill with support from both parties.
